resources.string:
Hi there, my name is Reza. My full name is Mohammad Reza Ali Firdaus. I am 19 years old currently, live in Surabaya, East Java, Indonesia. I am a colleger right now studying at Islamic University of Indonesia, bachelor of Informatics Engineering. 

 I have my interest for becoming Frontend Web Developer and Game Developer (still learning, dont mention me), and i want to become a successful developer in the future.. so i hope i can do it (hope you too). I have a big enthusiast in both world of game and web development, and so easy to interested in something interesting. 

 Feel free to explore, and ask me by contacting my social media that i have provide it on the contact section. If you want me to collaborate in your projects, dont hesitate to contact me. I will think it over if i have no or less hectic projects on my schedule. 

 I will see you on the next time.
